entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or rain beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 70 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
